name: Actionclub Zillertal
description:
Action Club Zillertal | Canyoning & Rafting ***THE outdoor specialist in Mayrhofen*** 
For over 20 years now the Action Club Zillertal is providing outdoor fun in and around Mayrhofen. Whether it is rafting, canyoning, tubing, mountain tours, climbing, mountain biking, climbing, high ropes, Action Park or tandem paragliding in summer and sledding, skiing, snow shoeing, Ski-Doo riding or ice climbing in winter, there are no limits in the Zillertal for adventure sports! The amazing mountains and rivers in the Zillertal provide the perfect location for loads of outdoor activities.
We only work with very experienced guides and partners, to guarantee you a maximum of safety so you can focus on having fun in your holidays in Mayrhofen in Zillertal.
If you have questions about our outdoor offers, then do not hesitate to send us an email or call us in the Action Club office in Mayrhofen!
We also arrange packages for individuals, couples, friends, family, bachelor like to tie up with you a package for individuals, couples, friends, family, school classes, etc., 
And of course we organize incentive events for companies or groups!
Hope to see you soon in Mayrhofen!
Your Action Club Team.
